divs: sighting detailsat wells township bld i was playing with a child on the swings recording her with a flip camera. i pretendinged to let her kick me and i fell to the ground never stopping the recording. on the review i noticed it. i just dismissed it till i noticed that it had purple\rose aura before it too off as a streak.
Summary: didnt notice till after event. was playing with a child at playground.
